flexible_busbar.description: Good resistance consistency and low heat generation

multiple_cables.description: Each resistor has a different value, resulting in differences in current flow and making it prone to heating

flexible_busbar.description: Small size, compact structure, easy installation; Specialized T-connector with high safety factor

multiple_cables.description: Multi splicing has a large volume and weight, and the joints are difficult to handle, which poses certain safety hazards

flexible_busbar.description: The product has a current carrying capacity of 200-6300A and does not require derating

multiple_cables.description: A single unit has a small current carrying capacity and requires multiple splicing and capacity reduction for use

flexible_busbar.description: High current density, significant copper savings, and higher cost-effectiveness

multiple_cables.description: Low current density, more copper is used, and the cost-effectiveness is lower

compact_busbar.description: It takes up a lot of installation space

flexible_busbar.description: When the temperature rises by 135K and the surrounding environment temperature is 40°C, the overload capacity can withstand more than 33%

compact_busbar.description: When the temperature rises by 70K and the surrounding environment temperature is 30°C, the overload capacity can withstand 15%

flexible_busbar.description: The on-site assembly of flexible busbar is easy to construct, easy to install and disassemble, and can be rearranged as needed. The branch circuit can be modified without affecting the overall power supply when the main circuit is live

compact_busbar.description: Need to assemble in factory in advance, and the construction difficulty is high. If there is design change happens on site, products need to be returned to the factory. Low reuse rate, unable to carry out live branch operations

flexible_busbar.description: Emergency backup can be used in case of system failure, utilizing the backup circuit conversion box can quickly restore power supply and improve system power supply stability

compact_busbar.description: Due to an accident requiring power outage for maintenance, it is impossible to restore power supply in a timely manner

flexible_busbar.description: Low temperature rise, low energy consumption, energy-saving, and the larger the current specification, the more superior its energy consumption value is displayed

compact_busbar.description: Poor heat dissipation, high line loss, and energy consumption exceeding 20%

product_structure.description: High current flexible busbar is made of high-purity copper wire as the conductor, combined with some cable technology and new materials, which is an innovative application product for high current transmission and distribution
